languages.text: {n}Что-то внутри птицы негромко посмеивается, затем она встряхивается, будто скидывая морок. Теперь псайберворон выглядит совсем как прежде — только внутри черных глаз горит насмешливый синий огонек.{/n}

{n}Something within the raven laughs softly, before the bird shakes itself as if to clear its head. It looks the same as before, but for the faint, mocking blue glow now emanating from its black eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Что-то внутри птицы негромко посмеивается, затем она встряхивается, будто скидывая морок. Теперь псайберворон выглядит совсем как прежде — только внутри черных глаз горит насмешливый синий огонек.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Etwas in dem Raben lacht leise, bevor der Vogel sich schüttelt, als wolle er seinen Kopf frei machen. Er sieht aus wie zuvor, bis auf das schwache, spöttische blaue Leuchten in seinen schwarzen Augen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something within the raven laughs softly, before the bird shakes itself as if to clear its head. It looks the same as before, but for the faint, mocking blue glow now emanating from its black eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Etwas in dem Raben lacht leise, bevor der Vogel sich schüttelt, als wolle er seinen Kopf frei machen. Er sieht aus wie zuvor, bis auf das schwache, spöttische blaue Leuchten in seinen schwarzen Augen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'entité pousse un petit rire, puis la corneille se secoue comme si elle reprenait ses esprits. Son apparence semble normale, à l'exception de la faible lueur bleue qui donne un air moqueur à ses yeux noirs.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something within the raven laughs softly, before the bird shakes itself as if to clear its head. It looks the same as before, but for the faint, mocking blue glow now emanating from its black eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'entité pousse un petit rire, puis la corneille se secoue comme si elle reprenait ses esprits. Son apparence semble normale, à l'exception de la faible lueur bleue qui donne un air moqueur à ses yeux noirs.{/n}

languages.text: {n}渡鸦体内传来了某种东西的轻笑声。随后，渡鸦摇了摇身子，似乎想把脑子里的东西赶出去。尽管它看起来与之前没有什么不同，但此刻，它的黑色眼珠里闪烁着微弱的蓝色光芒，带着嘲弄的意味。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something within the raven laughs softly, before the bird shakes itself as if to clear its head. It looks the same as before, but for the faint, mocking blue glow now emanating from its black eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}渡鸦体内传来了某种东西的轻笑声。随后，渡鸦摇了摇身子，似乎想把脑子里的东西赶出去。尽管它看起来与之前没有什么不同，但此刻，它的黑色眼珠里闪烁着微弱的蓝色光芒，带着嘲弄的意味。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Algo en el interior del cuervo produce una risita antes de sacudirse, como para despejarse. Tiene el mismo aspecto de antes, excepto por el tenue resplandor azul y burlón que ahora emana de sus ojos negros.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something within the raven laughs softly, before the bird shakes itself as if to clear its head. It looks the same as before, but for the faint, mocking blue glow now emanating from its black eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Algo en el interior del cuervo produce una risita antes de sacudirse, como para despejarse. Tiene el mismo aspecto de antes, excepto por el tenue resplandor azul y burlón que ahora emana de sus ojos negros.{/n}

languages.text: {n}レイヴンの内に宿った何かが、くぐもった笑い声を漏らした後、鳥は頭を振って身震いした。外見は元に戻ったように見えるが、真っ黒だったその眼からは、わずかにあざ笑うような青い光が漏れていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something within the raven laughs softly, before the bird shakes itself as if to clear its head. It looks the same as before, but for the faint, mocking blue glow now emanating from its black eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}レイヴンの内に宿った何かが、くぐもった笑い声を漏らした後、鳥は頭を振って身震いした。外見は元に戻ったように見えるが、真っ黒だったその眼からは、わずかにあざ笑うような青い光が漏れていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kuzgunun içinde bir şey hafifçe gülüyor. Kuş, başını silkeleyip kendine geliyor. Eskisiyle aynı görünür ancak siyah gözlerinden hafif, alaycı bir mavi parıltı sızıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something within the raven laughs softly, before the bird shakes itself as if to clear its head. It looks the same as before, but for the faint, mocking blue glow now emanating from its black eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kuzgunun içinde bir şey hafifçe güler. Kuş, başını silkeleyip kendine gelir. Eskisiyle aynı görünür ancak siyah gözlerinden hafif, alaycı bir mavi parıltı sızmaktadır.{/n}
